Question: What is CarMarket?
Answer: CarMarket is a modern full-stack marketplace for buying and selling used cars. It connects buyers and sellers through a secure platform with advanced search features and real-time messaging.

Question: How do I get started on CarMarket?
Answer: To get started, create a free account by clicking the "Register" button. Fill in your name, email, and password, then verify your email to begin browsing cars or listing your vehicle for sale.

Question: Is CarMarket free to use?
Answer: Yes, CarMarket is free for buyers to browse and search cars. Sellers can also list their cars for free on the platform.

Question: What devices can I use to access CarMarket?
Answer: CarMarket is fully responsive and works on desktop computers (Windows/Mac/Linux)
column5: and mobile phones (iOS/Android) through any modern web browser.

Question: Do I need an account to browse cars?
Answer: No, you can browse available cars without an account. However, you need to create an account to save favorites, contact sellers, or list your own car for sale.

Question: How do I create an account?
Answer: Click the Register button in the top right corner. Enter your first name

Question: Can I register using social media?
Answer: Yes, CarMarket supports OAuth authentication. You can register and login using your Google or Facebook account for quick access without creating a new password.

Question: How do I reset my password?
Answer: Click on "Forgot Password" on the login page, enter your registered email address, and you'll receive a password reset link via email.

Question: How do I change my password?
Answer: Log in to your account, go to your Profile page, and use the "Change Password" option. You'll need to enter your current password and new password.

Question: Can I update my profile information?
Answer: Yes, go to your Profile page where you can update your name, email, phone number, location, and add a bio.

Question: How do I upload a profile picture?
Answer: Visit your Profile page and click on the avatar/profile picture area. You can upload an image file (JPG
column4: PNG) to set as your profile picture.

Question: Is my personal information secure?
Answer: Yes, CarMarket uses JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication for secure sessions, encrypted password storage with bcrypt hashing, and follows industry-standard security practices.

Question: How do I delete my account?
Answer: Contact support through the chat system or email to request account deletion. An administrator will process your request within 24-48 hours.

Question: Can I have multiple accounts?
Answer: While technically possible, we recommend using only one account per user for better experience and to maintain trust within the community.

Question: How do I search for cars?
Answer: Use the search bar on the homepage to search by make, model, or keywords. You can also use the advanced filters to narrow down results by price, year, mileage, fuel type, body type, transmission, and location.

Question: What filters are available?
Answer: Available filters include: Car Make

Question: How can I sort the search results?
Answer: You can sort listings by: Newest First, Oldest First, Price (Low to High), Price (High to Low), Year (Newest First), Year (Oldest First), Mileage (Low to High), or Mileage (High to Low).

Question: How many cars are displayed per page?
Answer: By default, 12 cars are shown per page. You can change this to show 6, 12, 24, or 48 cars per page using the pagination controls.

Question: How do I view more details about a car?
Answer: Click on any car card to open the detailed listing page with complete specifications, multiple photos, seller information, and contact options.

Question: What information is shown in car listings?
Answer: Each listing shows: Make & Model, Year, Price, Mileage, Engine Size, Horsepower, Fuel Type, Transmission, Body Type, Color, Number of Doors/Seats, Condition, Features, Service History, Accident History, Previous Owners, Location, and multiple photos.

Question: Can I see the seller's information?
Answer: Yes, on the car detail page you can see the seller's name, profile picture, location, and contact options.

Question: How recent are the listings?
Answer: Listings are displayed in real-time. The homepage defaults to showing the newest listings first, and each listing shows when it was posted.

Question: Are all listed cars available?
Answer: Only active and approved listings are shown. If you see a listing, it means the car is currently available for sale unless the seller has marked it as sold.

Question: How do I search for a specific car make?
Answer: Use the Make filter dropdown which contains all available car brands in our system (Toyota, Honda, Ford, BMW, etc.), or type the make name in the main search bar.

Question: Can I search for cars by price range?
Answer: Yes, use the Price Range filter to set minimum and maximum prices. For example, set Min: $10,000 and Max: $25,000 to see cars in that price bracket.

Question: How do I find cars by year?
Answer: Use the Year Range filter to specify the range of model years you're interested in, such as from 2018 to 2023.

Question: Can I filter by fuel type?
Answer: Yes, you can filter by Gasoline, Diesel, Electric, Hybrid, Plug-in Hybrid, and other fuel types available in the system.

Question: What body types can I search for?
Answer: Available body types include: Sedan, SUV, Truck, Coupe, Convertible, Hatchback, Wagon, Van, Minivan, and more.

Question: How do I find automatic transmission cars only?
Answer: Use the Transmission filter and select Automatic. You can also filter for Manual transmission.

Question: Can I search by location?
Answer: Yes, enter a city or state in the Location filter to find cars near you.

Question: How do I clear all filters?
Answer: Click the "Clear Filters" or "Clear All" button to remove all active filters and return to viewing all available cars.

Question: Can I save my search preferences?
Answer: Currently, search preferences are not saved. However, you can save specific cars to your Favorites for easy access later.

Question: How many filters can I use at once?
Answer: You can use as many filters as you want simultaneously. All filters work together to help you find exactly what you're looking for.

Question: How do I contact a seller?
Answer: On the car detail page, click the "Contact Seller" or "Start Chat" button to begin a conversation with the seller about the vehicle.

Question: Is there a way to negotiate the price?
Answer: You can discuss pricing with the seller through the chat system. Many sellers are open to reasonable offers.

Question: Can I schedule a test drive?
Answer: Yes, use the chat system to communicate with the seller and arrange a convenient time and location for a test drive.

Question: How do I make an offer on a car?
Answer: Contact the seller through the messaging system and make your offer. Discuss terms and conditions directly with them.

Question: Does CarMarket handle payments?
Answer: No, CarMarket is a listing platform that connects buyers and sellers. All payment transactions are handled directly between the buyer and seller.

Question: What payment methods are accepted?
Answer: Payment methods are determined by the seller. Discuss acceptable payment methods (cash

Question: Is there buyer protection?
Answer: CarMarket provides a platform for connection. We recommend meeting in safe public places, inspecting vehicles thoroughly, verifying documentation, and using secure payment methods.

Question: Can I get a vehicle history report?
Answer: Some sellers provide vehicle history reports. You can request this information from the seller, or obtain your own report using the VIN (Vehicle Identification Number).

Question: What should I check before buying?
Answer: Verify: clean title, service history, accident history, current mileage, overall condition, test drive performance, seller identity, and ownership documents.

Question: How do I complete the purchase?
Answer: Once you've agreed on terms with the seller, arrange payment, complete necessary paperwork (title transfer, bill of sale), and register the vehicle with your local DMV.

Question: How do I list my car for sale?
Answer: Log in, click "Sell Car" or "Create Listing," fill in all required information (make, model, year, price, condition, photos), and submit for approval.

Question: What information do I need to provide?
Answer: Required details include: Make, Model, Year, Price, Mileage, Engine Size, Horsepower, Fuel Type, Transmission, Body Type, Color, Number of Doors, Number of Seats, Condition, Description, Location, and at least one photo.

Question: How many photos can I upload?
Answer: You can upload multiple photos (typically up to 10) showing different angles of your car: exterior front, sides, rear, interior, engine, dashboard, and any special features or damage.

Question: Can I edit my listing after posting?
Answer: Yes, go to "My Listings," find your car, click "Edit," make your changes, and save. Edited listings may require re-approval.

Question: How long does listing approval take?
Answer: Listings are typically reviewed and approved by administrators within 24 hours. You'll be notified once your listing is active.

Question: Is there a fee to list my car?
Answer: No, listing your car on CarMarket is completely free for sellers.

Question: How do I set the right price for my car?
Answer: Research similar cars on CarMarket and other platforms, consider your car's condition, mileage, year, features, and local market demand. You can use the virtual assistant for pricing tips.

Question: Can I mark my car as sold?
Answer: Contact the administrator or delete your listing once your car is sold to remove it from active listings.

Question: How do buyers contact me?
Answer: Buyers will contact you through CarMarket's secure messaging system. You'll receive notifications when someone sends you a message.

Question: Can I list multiple cars?
Answer: Yes, there's no limit. You can create separate listings for each vehicle you want to sell.

Question: What makes a good listing?
Answer: Include: clear
column4: well-lit photos; honest description of condition; complete specifications; competitive pricing; detailed service history; and quick responses to buyer inquiries.

Question: How do I delete my listing?
Answer: Go to "My Listings," find the car you want to remove, and click the "Delete" button.

Question: What are Favorites?
Answer: Favorites allow you to save listings you're interested in for easy access later, so you don't have to search for them again.

Question: How do I save a car to Favorites?
Answer: Click the heart icon on any car card or on the detailed listing page. The heart will fill in to show it's been added to your Favorites.

Question: Where can I see my Favorites?
Answer: Click on "Favorites" in the navigation menu to view all cars you've saved.

Question: How do I remove a car from Favorites?
Answer: Click the filled heart icon again on the car card or listing page to remove it from your Favorites.

Question: Is there a limit to how many cars I can favorite?
Answer: No, you can save as many cars as you want to your Favorites list.

Question: Do I need an account to use Favorites?
Answer: Yes, you must be logged in to save cars to Favorites. Create a free account to access this feature.

Question: Will I be notified if a favorited car's price changes?
Answer: Currently, automatic price change notifications are not available, but you can check your Favorites regularly to see updated information.

Question: Can I share my Favorites list?
Answer: Each user's Favorites list is private. You can share individual car links by copying the URL from the car detail page.

Question: How does the messaging system work?
Answer: CarMarket has a built-in real-time chat system. When you contact a seller, a conversation is created where you can exchange messages instantly.

Question: How do I start a conversation?
Answer: On any car listing detail page, click the "Contact Seller" or "Start Chat" button to begin a conversation about that specific vehicle.

Question: Can I see my message history?
Answer: Yes, go to "Conversations" or "Messages" to see all your ongoing conversations with buyers or sellers.

Question: Are messages real-time?
Answer: Yes, messages use Socket.IO technology for real-time delivery. You'll see messages instantly when the other person sends them.

Question: How do I know if someone is typing?
Answer: You'll see a typing indicator (""[Name] is typing..."") when the other person is composing a message.

Question: Can I send images in messages?
Answer: Currently, the chat system supports text messages. You can share additional photos by including links or arranging to send them via email.

Question: How do I know if I have new messages?
Answer: You'll see a notification badge with the number of unread messages in the navigation menu and on the Conversations page.

Question: Can I delete conversations?
Answer: Currently, conversations cannot be deleted by users. Contact support if you need to remove a conversation.

Question: Is my chat history saved?
Answer: Yes
column4: all your messages are saved in the database so you can reference previous conversations anytime.

Question: Can I block a user?
Answer: Currently, there is no built-in block feature. If you experience harassment or inappropriate behavior, report it to administrators immediately.

Question: How do I report inappropriate messages?
Answer: Contact an administrator through the support system or email. Provide details about the conversation and user for investigation.

Question: What information appears on my profile?
Answer: Your profile displays: Name, Profile Picture, Email, Phone Number (if provided), Location, Bio, Member Since date, and your active listings.

Question: Can other users see my email?
Answer: Your full email is private. Other users can only contact you through the CarMarket messaging system unless you choose to share your email directly.

Question: How do I update my contact information?
Answer: Go to your Profile page, click "Edit Profile," update your phone number or other contact details, and save changes.

Question: Can I add a bio to my profile?
Answer: Yes, on the Profile edit page you can add a bio describing yourself, your car expertise, or anything else you'd like other users to know.

Question: What image formats are supported for profile pictures?
Answer: Supported formats include JPG, JPEG, PNG, and other common image formats. Images are automatically resized for optimal display.

Question: How do I make my profile more trustworthy?
Answer: Add a clear profile picture, complete all profile information, respond promptly to messages, provide honest listings, and maintain good communication with other users.

Question: What is the Admin Panel?
Answer: The Admin Panel is a special interface for administrators to manage the platform, review listings, manage user accounts, and oversee metadata like car makes and models.

Question: How do I become an admin?
Answer: Admin accounts are created by the system owner. Regular users cannot self-promote to admin status. Contact the platform owner if you're interested in a moderation role.

Question: What can admins do?
Answer: Admins can: approve/reject listings, view dashboard statistics, manage car metadata (makes, models, fuel types, body types), create/edit/delete metadata entries, and monitor system activity.

Question: What is listing approval?
Answer: All new car listings are reviewed by administrators before appearing publicly. This ensures quality, prevents spam, and verifies that listings meet platform standards.

Question: Why was my listing rejected?
Answer: You'll receive a notification explaining the rejection reason. Common reasons include: incomplete information

Question: How long does approval take?
Answer: Most listings are reviewed within 24 hours. Complex cases may take longer. You can check your listing status in "My Listings."

Question: What is car metadata?
Answer: Metadata includes standardized lists of car makes (Toyota, Honda, etc.), models, fuel types, body types, transmission types, and features that ensure consistent data across the platform.

Question: Can I suggest new car makes or models?
Answer: Yes, contact administrators through the messaging system to suggest additions to the metadata. Include the make/model details and they'll review your request.

Question: What is the Virtual Assistant?
Answer: The Virtual Assistant is an AI-powered chatbot (blue chat bubble in the bottom-right corner) that helps you navigate the site, answer questions, and find cars based on your needs.

Question: How do I use the Virtual Assistant?
Answer: Click the blue chat bubble icon in the bottom-right corner of any page. Type your question or request, and the assistant will provide helpful responses and suggestions.

Question: What can the Virtual Assistant help me with?
Answer: The assistant can help with: searching for cars, understanding features, navigating the site, selling tips, pricing guidance, account questions, how-to instructions, and general platform information.

Question: Can the Virtual Assistant compare cars for me?
Answer: Yes! You can ask the assistant to compare two cars (e.g., "Compare Honda Civic vs Toyota Corolla") and it will search the inventory and provide a detailed comparison with specs, pricing, and recommendations.

Question: Is the Virtual Assistant AI-powered?
Answer: Yes, it uses advanced intent recognition and can provide context-aware responses based on your current page, authentication status, and previous interactions.

Question: Can the Virtual Assistant search for specific cars?
Answer: Yes, tell the assistant what you're looking for (e.g., "Show me SUVs under $30,000") and it can guide you to relevant listings or apply appropriate filters.

Question: Does the Virtual Assistant work 24/7?
Answer: Yes, the Virtual Assistant is always available to help you, any time of day or night.

Question: Can I minimize the Virtual Assistant?
Answer: Yes, you can minimize and maximize the chat window as needed. An unread badge will appear if there are new messages while minimized.

Question: How do I compare two cars?
Answer: Use the Virtual Assistant and ask to compare specific cars (e.g., "Compare Mazda CX-5 vs Honda CR-V"). The system will find matching cars in inventory and provide a detailed side-by-side comparison.

Question: What information is compared?
Answer: The comparison includes: Basic Information (make, model, year, price), Performance (engine size, horsepower, fuel type, transmission), Specifications (body type, doors, seats, color), History (mileage, owners, service history, accidents), and Features.

Question: Can I compare more than two cars?
Answer: Currently the system is optimized for comparing two cars at a time. You can make multiple comparison requests for different vehicle pairs.

Question: What if the cars I want to compare aren't in the inventory?
Answer: The system will provide general comparison information based on market knowledge, including typical price ranges, features, and recommendations for each model.

Question: Does the comparison show which car is better?
Answer: Yes, the comparison highlights winners for specific attributes (lower price, better fuel economy, more features, etc.) and provides an AI-generated summary with advantages of each car.

Question: Can I save comparison results?
Answer: Currently comparison results are not saved. You can take screenshots or notes on the comparison to reference later.

Question: How accurate are the comparisons?
Answer: Comparisons are based on actual listing data from our inventory, ensuring accuracy for price, mileage, and specifications of available cars.

Question: Is my data secure on CarMarket?
Answer: Yes, CarMarket uses industry-standard security measures including JWT authentication, bcrypt password hashing, HTTPS encryption (in production), and secure database storage.

Question: How is my password protected?
Answer: Passwords are hashed using bcrypt (a strong one-way encryption algorithm) before being stored. Even administrators cannot see your actual password.

Question: What browsers are supported?
Answer: CarMarket works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Chrome Mobile). We recommend using the latest browser versions.

Question: Does CarMarket have a mobile app?
Answer: Not currently, but the website is fully responsive and works excellently on mobile devices through your phone's web browser.

Question: Is my browsing history tracked?
Answer: We track basic analytics to improve the platform, but we don't sell your data to third parties. See our Privacy Policy for full details.

Question: Can I use CarMarket without cookies?
Answer: Some cookies are essential for authentication and site functionality. Without them, features like staying logged in won't work properly.

Question: What should I do if I suspect fraudulent activity?
Answer: Report any suspicious listings, messages, or behavior to administrators immediately through the contact form or messaging system. Include as much detail as possible.

Question: How do I report a security vulnerability?
Answer: Contact the technical team directly through email or the support system. We take security reports seriously and will investigate promptly.

Question: Are prices negotiable?
Answer: That depends on the seller. Many sellers are open to reasonable offers. Use the messaging system to discuss pricing with individual sellers.

Question: Why do some cars have ""Contact for Price""?
Answer: Some sellers prefer to discuss pricing directly. Click "Contact Seller" to inquire about the price.

Question: How often are prices updated?
Answer: Sellers can update their listing prices at any time. Check the listing date or "Last Updated" information to see when a listing was most recently modified.

Question: Are there any hidden fees?
Answer: CarMarket doesn't charge buyers or sellers platform fees. However, when purchasing a car, there may be external costs like taxes, registration, title transfer, and inspection fees.

Question: Can I see sold listings?
Answer: Currently, only active listings are shown. Sold cars are removed from the platform to keep the inventory current.

Question: How do I know if a price is fair?
Answer: Compare similar cars on CarMarket and other platforms, check market value guides (KBB, Edmunds), consider mileage, condition, and location. The Virtual Assistant can also provide pricing guidance.

Question: How many cars are available on CarMarket?
Answer: The number changes daily as new cars are listed and sold. You can see the total number of search results when browsing the inventory.

Question: What makes CarMarket different from other platforms?
Answer: CarMarket offers: modern responsive design, real-time messaging, AI-powered Virtual Assistant, advanced search filters, car comparison tool, favorites system, and a secure, user-friendly experience.

Question: Can businesses or dealers use CarMarket?
Answer: Yes, both private sellers and dealers can list vehicles on CarMarket. Seller type may be indicated in their profile.

Question: How do I contact customer support?
Answer: Use the Virtual Assistant for immediate help, or contact administrators through the messaging system. You can also find contact information in the footer or About page.

Question: Is CarMarket available in my country?
Answer: CarMarket is primarily designed for the US market. Check the location filters to see if cars are available in your area.

Question: Can I suggest new features?
Answer: Yes! We welcome user feedback. Contact administrators through the messaging system with your feature suggestions and ideas for improvement.

Question: How do I stay updated on new features?
Answer: Follow CarMarket's social media channels, subscribe to newsletters (if available), or check the website regularly for announcements and updates.

Question: What is the refund policy?
Answer: CarMarket is a listing platform only. Refund policies are determined by individual sellers and should be discussed before completing any purchase.

Question: How do I provide feedback?
Answer: Contact administrators through the messaging system, or leave feedback through any feedback forms available on the site.

Question: Can I export my favorite cars list?
Answer: Currently, there's no export feature. You can view your favorites anytime by logging in and navigating to the Favorites page.

Question: I forgot my password. What should I do?
Answer: Click "Forgot Password" on the login page, enter your email, and follow the password reset instructions sent to your inbox.

Question: I'm not receiving emails from CarMarket.
Answer: Check your spam/junk folder. Add CarMarket's email address to your contacts. If still not receiving emails, contact support.

Question: Why can't I upload photos?
Answer: Ensure your images are in supported formats (JPG, PNG) and not too large (usually under 5-10MB). Try using a different browser or clearing your cache.

Question: The website is loading slowly. What can I do?
Answer: Check your internet connection, try clearing your browser cache, or try a different browser. The issue may also be temporary server load.

Question: I can't see any listings.
Answer: This could be due to overly restrictive filters. Click "Clear Filters" to reset and view all available cars. If the problem persists, contact support.

Question: My messages aren't sending.
Answer: Check your internet connection. Ensure you're logged in. Try refreshing the page. If the problem continues, report it to support.

Question: I'm getting an error when creating a listing.
Answer: Ensure all required fields are filled correctly. Check that your images are valid and not too large. If errors persist, contact administrator support.

Question: How do I clear my browser cache?
Answer: Press Ctrl+Shift+Delete (Windows) or Cmd+Shift+Delete (Mac) in your browser. Select cache/cookies and clear them. This can fix many display issues.

Question: The Virtual Assistant isn't responding.
Answer: Try refreshing the page or logging out and back in. If the issue persists, use traditional navigation or contact support.

Question: Who do I contact for technical issues?
Answer: Report technical problems through the Virtual Assistant, contact form, or email support. Include details about the issue, what you were doing, and any error messages.

Question: What should I include in my car listing description?
Answer: Mention: key features, recent maintenance/repairs, reason for selling, notable upgrades, any issues or damage (honesty builds trust), and why your car is a great buy.

Question: How can I make my listing stand out?
Answer: Use high-quality photos, write a detailed honest description, price competitively, highlight unique features, respond quickly to inquiries, and keep your listing information updated.

Question: What are the best practices for car photos?
Answer: Take photos in good lighting (preferably daytime outdoors), clean your car first, capture all angles (front, rear, both sides, interior, engine bay), show any damage honestly, and use a neutral background.

Question: How should I communicate with buyers/sellers?
Answer: Be professional and courteous, respond promptly, be honest about condition and terms, ask relevant questions, verify identity before meeting, and keep all communication on platform initially.

Question: What safety precautions should I take when meeting?
Answer: Meet in public places (police station parking lots are ideal), bring a friend, inform someone of your plans, meet during daylight, verify the other person's identity, and trust your instincts.

Question: How can I verify a seller is legitimate?
Answer: Check their profile completeness, review their response time and communication style, ask for VIN and vehicle history, verify ownership documents, and research the vehicle independently.

Question: What documents should I bring to a purchase?
Answer: Bring: valid ID, proof of insurance, payment method, bill of sale template, title transfer forms, and any pre-purchase inspection results.

Question: Should I get a pre-purchase inspection?
Answer: Yes, highly recommended! Have a trusted mechanic inspect any used car before purchase to identify potential issues and verify the car's condition matches the listing.

Question: How do I protect myself from scams?
Answer: Never send money without seeing the car, meet in person, verify ownership, be wary of prices too good to be true, use secure payment methods, and report suspicious activity immediately.

Question: What questions should I ask a seller?
Answer: Ask about: maintenance history, accident history, reason for selling, number of previous owners, any mechanical issues, available service records, and if they have a clean title.
